Control Name: SA-11 (3) INDEPENDENT VERIFICATION OF ASSESSMENT PLANS / EVIDENCE
Control Statement: The organization:                                                                                                                     (a) Requires an independent agent satisfying [Assignment: organization-defined independence criteria] to verify the correct implementation of the developer security assessment plan and the evidence produced during security testing/evaluation; and(b) Ensures that the independent agent is either provided with sufficient information to complete the verification process or granted the authority to obtain such information.
